appDesc.message: Capture a screenshot of your current page in entirety and reliably—without requesting any extra permissions!
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

_Activateallthelinksonthepagewhendownloa.message:
Activate all the links on the page when downloading as a PDF. Clicking on the link in the PDF will open a page in your browser.

**This is an experimental feature that is still in development—please report any issues to customer support using the “Report issue” flag icon above.**

_AddyourscreenshotsURLandcapturedatetime.message: Add your screenshot’s URL and capture date/time when exporting to PDF from the main view screenshot page. You can add URL and capture date in the Editor from the “More” menu.

_AddyourscreenshotsURLandcapturedatewhen.message: Add your screenshot’s URL and capture date when exporting to PDF from the main view screenshot page. You can add URL and capture date in the Editor from the “More” menu.

_AndclickthepinnexttoGoFullPagesoitturns.message: And click the pin next to “GoFullPage” so it turns blue:

_Anyoptionalpermissionsthatwerepreviousl.message: Any optional permissions that were previously granted will appear checked here. You can revoke them at any time. If they are needed again in the future, they will be re-requested.

_Areyousureyouwanttodelete1screencapture.message:
Are you sure you want to delete 1 screencapture?
 (This action cannot be undone.)

_Areyousureyouwanttodeletecountscreencap.message:
Are you sure you want to delete $count$ screen captures?
 (This action cannot be undone.)

_Areyousureyouwanttodeletethisscreenshot.message:
Are you sure you want to delete this screenshot?
(This action cannot be undone.)

_Areyousureyouwanttoresettotheextensions.message: Are you sure you want to reset to the extension’s original theme defaults?

_AutodownloadisenabledYoucanchangethisin.message: Auto-download is enabled. You can change this in options.

_Automaticallydownloadyourscreenshotasan.message: Automatically download your screenshot as an image instead of opening it in a new window.This means the extension capture tab will not open. You can return back here by right-clicking on the extension and selecting "Options".

_Automaticallyshowasaveasdialogwhendownl.message: Automatically show a "save as" dialog when downloading your screenshots. If the “Ask where to save each file before downloading” option is enabled in your browser’s settings, then that takes priority.

_Backtocapturechangesareautosavedintheed.message: Back to capture (changes are auto-saved in the editor)

_Bonuswehaveaddednewtimestampformatstoo.message: Bonus: we have added new timestamp formats too!

_Cannotautodownloadyouneedtoreapprovethe.message: Cannot auto-download, you need to reapprove the Downloads permission in options.

_ConfigureyoursettingsfortheGoFullPageex.message: Configure your settings for the GoFullPage extension. Stay tuned for further updates. Beta settings may change in the future.

_Displaythecapturedateinthisformatorhide.message: Display the capture date in this format or hide it entirely.

_Dontworryyourfavoritefeaturesarestillhe.message: Don’t worry, your favorite features are still here! Crop, URL, datestamp, and padding are now in the new “Formatting” menu. Watch the demo to see more.

_ErrorhandlingfilesPleasereportthisviath.message: Error handling files. Please report this via the flag reporting button above.

_Extrapermissionsarerequiredtoaccesstheu.message: Extra permissions are required to access the underlying page.

_Filenolongerexistsperhapsithasbeenclear.message: File no longer exists—perhaps it has been cleared from your browser

_FitcopiestoGoogleDocslimits.message: Fit copies to Google Docs limits

_Foradditionalinformationyoucancheckout.message: For additional information, you can check out:

_Foradditionalquestionsaidinvalidlinkdat.message: For additional questions, contact us.

_Ifthispersistspleasereportitviatheflagr.message: If this persists, please report it via the flag reporting button above.

_Ifyoudliketotrythisfeatureinthefuturecl.message: If you’d like to try this feature in the future, click on the “Edit” button up top.

_IfyoudontseethecameraiconthenclicktheEx.message: If you don’t see the camera icon, then click the “Extensions” puzzle icon in the top right of your browser:

_Lookforanelementwithinthepagewithitsown.message: Look for an element within the page with its own scroll bars and scroll that item during the capture.

_Mightyouconsidertakingaminutetorateitin.message: Might you consider taking a minute to rate it in the $webstore$?

_NoscreencapturesfoundGomakesome.message: No screen captures found. Go make some!

_Notethispageistoolargeforthebrowsertoca.message: Note: this page is too large for the browser to capture as one image. It will be split into multiple images.

_OnMacChromethereareissueswithsaveasfora.message: On Mac Chrome there are issues with "save as" for auto-download and when downloading multiple files, so it is disabled in those scenarios.

_PerformextracheckswhensplittingaPDFacro.message: Perform extra checks when splitting a PDF across multiple pages to try to prevent it from cutting lines of text in half. Otherwise, the screenshot is split at the paper size height regardless of its content.

_Pleasegotoyourbrowsersextensionsettings.message: Please go to your browser’s extension settings and enable “Allow access to file URLs”, so the extension can access this page.

_PleasetryagainandwaittoseetheImagecopie.message: Please try again and wait to see the “Image copied to clipboard” message before switching to another window.

_PNGislosslessandshouldmatchexactlywhati.message: PNG is lossless and should match exactly what is seen on the screen, but will usually have larger file sizes than JPG, which uses compression.

_Savethispermissionifacceptedforfutureca.message: Save this permission (if accepted) for future captures. It can still be revoked later from the options page.

_Select1ormorescreenshotstousethisaction.message: Select 1 or more screenshots to use this action.

_Signupforafree7daytrialtounlocktheedito.message: Sign up for a free 7-day trial to unlock the editor and download your masterpiece.

_SignupforPremiuminordertoexportyouredit.message: Sign up for Premium in order to export your edits.

_SomethingwentwrongTryrefreshingthepagea.message:
Something went wrong. Try refreshing the page and running this again.

If this persists, please contact us.

_Sometimeselementslikeabacktotopbuttonor.message: Sometimes elements, like a “back to top” button or a sticky footer will repeat on the page. This tries to position them absolutely to stop them from repeating in a screeshot.

_Specifyadirectoryunderneathyourdownload.message: Specify a directory underneath your downloads directory to save your screenshots, such as “screencaptures”. Defaults to the downloads directory if blank. (Please limit it to letters, numbers, dashes, underscores, and slashes—invalid characters will automatically be removed).

_SpecifytheformatsizeofPDFsforwhenexport.message: Specify the format size of PDFs for when exporting to PDF.

_Takeascreenshotofanentirewebpageinjusto.message: Take a screenshot of an entire web page in just one click of the extension’s icon in the top right of $browser$

_Thebestandsafestwaytocaptureascreenshot.message: The best and safest way to capture a screenshot of an entire web page.

_ThebrowserdoesnotallowaccesstosomeURLsf.message: The browser does not allow access to some URLs for security reasons. This includes the web store gallery, other extensions, and $browser_protocol$ URLs. The current page appears to be a restricted URL.

_Thebrowserpreventsextensionsfromsavingf.message: The browser prevents extensions from saving files outside of the default downloads directory. The path you entered has been updated accordingly. Sorry!

_Thedownloadpermissionisrequiredtoenable.message: The download permission is required to enable the download as PDF feature.

_Thefollowingfilescouldnotbedownloaded.message: The following files could not be downloaded:

_Therewasanerrordownloadingfilespleasere.message: There was an error downloading files, please report it via the flag button above.

_Thesesettingswillapplytoallfutureeditso.message: These settings will apply to all future edits of screenshots. Changes are autosaved.

_Thespecifiedimagecouldnotbefound.message: The specified image could not be found.

_ThisextensiontakesalotofworktomaintainI.message: This extension takes a lot of work to maintain. It’s really meaningful to hear that you find it useful!

_ThisistakinglongertoloadthanexpectedHan.message: This is taking longer to load than expected. Hang tight! If nothing updates after a while, please report this via the reporting flag button above.

_Thispermissionallowsgreatercontroloverh.message: This permission allows greater control over how downloads work within the extension. Your preference has been saved, and this download button will now fall back to default browser on-click downloads. However, you will still be prompted for it in order to use any of the advanced features on the Files or Edit pages, since they need this permissions to work.

_Thispermissionisrequiredforthedownloadb.message: This permission is required for the download buttons and the auto-download feature.

_Thispermissionisrequiredinordertoscroll.message: This permission is required in order to scroll the inner contents of $iframes$ or $framesets$.

_Thissiteappearstohaveembeddedcontentwit.message: This site appears to have embedded content within an a frameset.
This site appears to have embedded content within an iframe.

_Tryoutanotherpageonthewebsuchasahrefhtt.message: Try out another page on the web, such as this one. Have fun!

_Warningtheextensionisnotdesignedtohandl.message: Warning: the extension is not designed to handle extremely large captures. It might fail to complete a capture of this page.

_WelcometotheofficialGoFullPageEditor.message: Welcome to the official GoFullPage Editor!

_Wereexcitedtohaveyouaboard.message: We’re excited to have you aboard.

_Whencopyingascreenshottoyourclipboardau.message: When copying a screenshot to your clipboard, auto-resize it if it exceeds the Google Docs copy-paste limit (25,000,000 pixels). You may still experience issues pasting very large images into other applications, for example Google Docs sometimes truncates the image unless you resize it much smaller.

_Wouldyouliketoreportanyissuesyoureexper.message: Would you like to report any issues you’re experiencing, so we can improve this extension together?

_Youcanrunthisonanywebpageexceptforonesw.message: You can run this on any webpage, except for ones where the browser restricts extensions from running scripts. This includes the extension web store, browser settings pages, and other extensions.

_Youmayneedtoreruntheextensionafterinter.message: You may need to re-run the extension after interacting with the dialog. If you cancel, it will capture just the visible screen.

_Youneedtograntthedownloadprivilegeinord.message: You need to grant the download privilege in order to download files

_Youneedtosignupinordertoexportyouredite.message: You need to sign up in order to export your edited image.

_YourbrowserdoesnotsupporttheclipboardAP.message: Your browser does not support the clipboard API, please update to the most recent version.
